title: Geocoding to NUTS Region Codes
text: {nutscoder} provides function nuts_geocode, attempts find NUTS region codes location names using Nominatim search OpenStreetMap (OSM) data.

title: Geocoding to NUTS Region Codes
text: sf geometry geocoded NUTS regions can returned:  argument nominatim_api can used specify API URL Nominatim instance used search OSM data. default, nuts_geocode() uses public Nominatim instance (nominatim_api = "https://nominatim.openstreetmap.org"), absolute maximum 1 request per second suitable intensive use. can install instance Nominatim avoid limitations public instance.
code: library(nutscoder) nuts_geocode(c("Hamburgo", "ŸáÿßŸÖÿ®Ÿàÿ±ÿ∫", "HH", "Berlin", "üêªB√§rlin", "„Éô„É´„É™„É≥",                "North Rhine-Westphalia", "nrw")) #> # A tibble: 8 √ó 5 #>   location               name                nuts_1 nuts_2 nuts_3 #>   <chr>                  <chr>               <chr>  <chr>  <chr>  #> 1 Hamburgo               Hamburg             DE6    DE60   DE600  #> 2 ŸáÿßŸÖÿ®Ÿàÿ±ÿ∫                Hamburg             DE6    DE60   DE600  #> 3 HH                     Hamburg             DE6    DE60   DE600  #> 4 Berlin                 Berlin              DE3    DE30   DE300  #> 5 üêªB√§rlin               Berlin              DE3    DE30   DE300  #> 6 „Éô„É´„É™„É≥               Berlin              DE3    DE30   DE300  #> 7 North Rhine-Westphalia Nordrhein-Westfalen DEA    <NA>   <NA>   #> 8 nrw                    Nordrhein-Westfalen DEA    <NA>   <NA> nuts_geocode(c("berlin", "brandenburg"), return_geometry = TRUE) |>    sf::st_geometry() |>    plot()
